title: Apple iPhone 14 Pro - 256GB - Space Black
description: Pristine condition iPhone 14 Pro. No scratches on screen or body. Battery health at 92%. Comes with original box and cable.

title: Sony A7 III Mirrorless Camera Kit
description: Low shutter count (15k). Includes 28-70mm lens, 2 spare batteries, and a premium leather strap. Perfect for pro photography.

title: Herman Miller Aeron Size B - Mineral
description: Ergonomic masterpiece in the rare Mineral/Satin Aluminum finish. Fully loaded with posture fit SL and adjustable arms. Lightly used for 1 year.

title: MacBook Pro 14 M2 Pro - 16GB RAM/512GB
description: Space Grey MacBook Pro with the powerful M2 Pro chip. Stunning Liquid Retina XDR display. Minor scuff on bottom case, otherwise mint.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation. Silver edition. Used for 3 months, still looks brand new. Includes carrying case and auxiliary cable.

title: DJI Mavic 3 Pro Cine Premium Combo
description: Complete production kit with Apple ProRes support. Triple camera system. Only 5 flying hours logged. Includes smart controller and ND filters.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED - White
description: Vibrant 7-inch OLED screen. Standard accessories included + Super Mario Odyssey. Used once, boxed immediately.

title: IKEA BEKANT Sit/Stand Desk - Oak
description: Electric sit/stand desk. Stable and clean motorized lift. Oak veneer top with black underframe. Perfect for home office setups.

title: Xbox Series X Console - 1TB
description: Fastest Xbox ever. Includes 2 controllers and 3 months of Game Pass code unused. Original packaging available.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra - 512GB
description: Phantom Black. 200MP camera powerhouse. Small hairline scratch on back glass, screen is perfect. Includes S-Pen.

title: Fender Player Stratocaster - Polar White
description: Classic Fender tone. Maple fretboard. Professional set-up recently done. Minor buckle rash on the back. Includes gig bag.

title: Apple Watch Ultra 2 - Titanium
description: Rugged and capable. Always-on Retina display. Includes Ocean Band (Blue). 100% battery health. AppleCare+ active until 2025.

title: Herman Miller Sayl Chair - Fog White
description: Inspired by the architecture of suspension bridges. Iconic 3D intelligent back. Balanced support and freedom of movement. Used in a clean home office for 2 years.
